ygData.subject: Re: Research
ygData.msgSnippet: A gypsy named marsella (I think) has it.  She is in a camp just up the road from the bridge in E. karna(I think).  There is a guard tower up on the hill from
ygData.messageBody:
A gypsy named "marsella" (I think) has it. She is in a camp just up the
road from the bridge in E. karna(I think). There is a guard tower up on the
hill from her.camp. Also be very alert here. hill giants and griffens
patrol close to this area. This item may not be working properly, I am not
sure. You can get 3 books from her. The research tome for a greater light
stone and the two recipe books for a lightstone each. Good luck.
